005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Used to visit a catalog containing groups and controls.
014 *
015 * @param <T>
016 *          the type of the context object used to pass calling context
017 *          information
018 * @param <R>
019 *          the type of the result for visiting a collection of groups and/or
020 *          controls
021 */
022public interface ICatalogVisitor<T, R> {
023
024  /**
025   * Called when visiting a group.
026   * <p>
027   * Can be overridden by classes extending this interface to support processing
028   * of the visited object.
029   *
030   * @param group
031   *          the Metapath item for the group
032   * @param childResult
033   *          the result of evaluating the group's children
034   * @param state
035   *          the calling context information
036   * @return a meaningful result of the given type
037   */
038  default R visitGroup(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem group, R childResult, T state) {
039    // do nothing by default
040    return childResult;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Called when visiting a control.
045   * <p>
046   * Can be overridden by classes extending this interface to support processing
047   * of the visited object.
048   *
049   * @param control
050   *          the Metapath item for the control
051   * @param childResult
052   *          the result of evaluating the control's children
053   * @param state
054   *          the calling context information
055   * @return a meaningful result of the given type
056   */
057  default R visitControl(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem control, R childResult, T state) {
058    // do nothing by default
059    return childResult;
060  }
061}
